Woman Strips Naked In The Middle Of A Busy Road, While Having An Argument With A Taxi Driver

Video of a woman stripping in the middle of a road in Singapore has been going viral. The 31-year-old can be seen chasing and yelling after the taxi driver in the short clip around 2 am on Middle Road in Singapore.

The two apparently got into a bizarre argument and at one point, she was even chasing him, trying to strike him and grabbing her black dress at the same time.

In the clip, we can see that the taxi driver runs away and the woman takes down her dress and even her underwear as the traffic keeps passing her by.

A man watching the events unfold, pulled her underpants back up when she took them down.





The same man then picked up her dress, handed it to her and apparently motioned her in the other direction, trying to stop her from chasing the taxi driver any further.

Some other footage reportedly shows the taxi driver laughing and pointing at the injuries that he sustained.

A witness reportedly wrote on Facebook, 'He didn't lay any hands on her … I decided to record it, in case he needs help with evidence. I only ended up capturing this part. At least this video shows that the lady undressed herself’.
